content: this is a fun quick little heart pattern that s easy to memorize if you need to make a bunch for an event or a market it s also a great gift for loved ones you can even use the base pattern without safety eyes as an accessory for other amigurumi materials that i used about 20 yards of size 6 yarn recycled yarn stuffing polyfill will work 14mm safety eyes embroidery thread for detailing if you want additional details darning needle stitch marker row counter or a way to keep count of how many rounds you ve done your heart plush will be about 10cm tall depending on gauge yarn and hook size
